main event: Multiple witnesses observed a UFO in Watertown, New York on 11 May 1949.
interesting points: The object was initially perceived as a reflection of sunlight and transformed in appearance,First described as resembling an auto hub cap, it appeared as a shiny silver ball,Multiple reports noted the object left a smoke trail of varying lengths and appearances, The object gained altitude and then leveled off while moving slowly, Sightings were confirmed by multiple witnesses including a housewife and her family.
sighted object: a shiny silver ball resembling an automobile hub cap
witness description: witnesses included a housewife and her family members
